General.Name: Sona Topas Tourism Industry
General.Description: PT Sona Topas Tourism Industry Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a tour and travel agency in Indonesia. It operates through three divisions: Travel, Duty Free Shop, and Retail Shop. The company sells tours and travel tickets, as well as handles related documents and tours. It also operates duty free shops in Bali; and retail shops in Jakarta, Bali, and Makassar. The company was formerly known as PT Sona Topas and changed its name to PT Sona Topas Tourism Industry Tbk in October 1990. PT Sona Topas Tourism Industry Tbk was incorporated in 1978 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia.
